title: [Server Issues 2/2/16] Login Issues and Client Disconnects
body:
Hey everyone, 

**UPDATE: 4:58PM AEDT **- The issue appears to have been resolved. If you encounter any problems being matched into a game, please post a reply below. Thanks!

**UPDATE: 4:55PM AEDT** - Summoners seem to be able to make it through the login queue; however, there might be an issue with creating matches. (Investigating)

~~Riot is currently aware that there's an issue with logging in and connecting to the servers. Hang tight, as they're working to resolve these issues. Sorry for the inconvenience. ~~

Thanks!

replies.body: Login/Game servers are currently back up.
I literally just uploaded that also lol
Queues should've quickly been relieved. Are you still having problems connecting?
Queues should've quickly been relieved. Are you still having problems connecting?
You gotta feel bad for all those people who came home from school eager to play Jhin and get disappointed :(
Looks like Jhin sniped the server :p

Just had a game where the client crashed 3 times before I could get in.  Another player was duo with someone else and he couldn't get in at all.  In game, the client crashed another 3-4 times.  Not just DC-ing or freezing up but a complete crash.
GOD DAMN I WANT THAT JHIN BOOTY
Approx time? Just a question haha.
Done ASAP lol last night to play League for awhile before i head back into school for my last year :)
Fix it or I leave for good
